title: A preamble vnto an incounter with P.R. the author of the deceitfull treatise of mitigation concerning the Romish doctrine both in question of rebellion and aequiuocation: by Thomas Morton. Published by authoritie.
author: Morton, Thomas, 1564-1659.
publisher: Printed by Melch. Bradwood for Iohn Bill and Edmond Weauer,
notes: Running title reads: A preamble vnto the incounter against the mitigation of P.R.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
